paragraphs.text: The Legend of Korra—The Art of the Animated Series, Book Two: Spirits (ISBN 1-61655-462-2) is an art book written by Michael Dante DiMartino, Bryan Konietzko, and Joaquim Dos Santos that is based on the second book of The Legend of Korra. Similar to its predecessor, the volume offers an inside look at the developmental and creative process that Book Two underwent prior to its release through a series of preliminary artworks supplemented by commentary from the creators.

paragraphs.body: The second of four art books, one for each book in the series, it was released on September 16, 2014, and spans 184 pages.
